card.name: Goblet of the White City
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] companion. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, discard 2 random cards from hand or discard this possession.

card.name: Green Dragon Mug
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, exert bearer or discard this possession.

card.name: Rohirrim Stein
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] companion. Each time you move to a site, bearer is strength +1 until the end of the game. At the start of your fellowship phase, add (2) or discard this possession.

card.name: Army of Dunland
card.property: To play, spot a [Dunland] Man. Menace - When you play this minion, discard up to 2 Free People's possessions.

card.name: Dwarven Escort
card.property: Damage +1. Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase draw 4 cards.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Triumph - At the start of the archery phase, make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Triumph - At the start of a skirmish involving Treebeard discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Gollum
card.property: To play, spot a [Gollum] condition. Menace - When you play Gollum make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Triumph - At the start of the maneuver phase, you may wound a minion.

card.name: Army of Isengard
card.property: Damage +1. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Menace - When you play this minion, it becomes fierce.

card.name: Army of Moria
card.property: To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion, draw 3 cards.

card.name: Army of Harad
card.property: Southron. Archer. To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Menace - When you play this minion, add ten tokens to the twilight pool.

card.name: The Nazgul
card.property: Fierce. To play, spot a Nazgul. Menace - When you play this minion add 2 burdens.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase, the move limit for this turn is +1.

card.name: Army of Sauron
card.property: To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion, make it strength +10.

card.name: Sam
card.property: Triumph - At the start of the fellowship phase remove 3 burdens. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (Resistance 5).

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.property: Fellowship: Add a burden to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.name: Bill the Pony
card.property: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony if he is at an underground site during the fellowship or regroup phase.

card.name: Fireworks
card.property: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 [Gandalf] or up to 2 [Shire] cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Council Courtyard
card.property: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves from Council Courtyard, remove (2).

card.name: Horn of Boromir
card.property: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Balin
card.property: Underground. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play or from hand to heal your companion.

card.name: Book of Mazarbul
card.property: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.

card.name: Galadriel
card.property: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to look at an opponent's hand.

card.name: Phial of Galadriel
card.property: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an [Isengard] minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion; Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn and add (1) to prevent that wound.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play add a burden. Regroup: Exert Smeagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a [Rohan] possession on Theoden to heal a [Rohan] ally.

card.name: Black Rider
card.property: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

card.name: Treebeard
card.property: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.name: Fell Beast
card.property: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is fierce.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Knight. At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add (2) to heal another [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. While you can spot 3 wounded minions, each minion skirmishing Legolas is strength -3.

card.name: Denethor
card.property: Denethor is strength +1 for each other [Gondor] Man you can spot (limit +4).

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While you cannot spot 3 companions of the same culture, Gandalf is strength -2.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (resistance 12).

card.name: Arwen
card.property: While skirmishing a fierce minion, Arwen is strength +3.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Valiant. While skirmishing a mounted minion, Eowyn is strength +2. While skirmishing a fierce minion, Eowyn is strength +2.

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Damage +2. The twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a [Moria] minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.

card.name: The Pale Blade
card.property: Bearer must be The Witch-king. He is damage +1. Response: If The Witch-king wins a skirmish, exert him to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.

card.name: Firefoot
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. If bearer is Eomer, he is defender +1. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Bearer must be Gimli. He takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Skirmish: Discard Gimli's Helm to prevent all wounds to him.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ring-bound. Ranger. The twilight cost of each other [Gondor] Man in your starting fellowship is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, Faramir is strength +2.

card.name: Whip of Many Thongs
card.property: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Valiant. Response: If Eowyn is exhausted and about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: Axe of Erebor
card.property: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a [Dwarven] condition or a card stacked on a [Dwarven] condition to make Gimli strength +1.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Exert Aragorn to wound a minion; Aragorn does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: The Balrog
card.property: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Ulaire Nelya is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion assigned to skirmish an unbound companion.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Skirmish: Remove an [Elven] token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a [Rohan] token to wound a minion twice.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. When you play Eomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck and play all [Rohan] possessions revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Glorfindel
card.property: When Glorfindel is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2. Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may exert Glorfindel to make a Nazgul he is skirmishing strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: Radagast
card.property: The move limit is +1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, each opponent may discard 2 cards from hand to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Goldberry
card.property: Each time the fellowship moves to a river, heal Goldberry and Tom Bombadil. Skirmish: If the fellowship is at a river, exert Goldberry to make a companion strength +1.

card.name: Tom Bombadil
card.property: To play, remove 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: Spot 2 [Shire] companions and exert Tom Bombadil X times, where X is the fellowship's site number, to cancel a skirmish involving a [Shire] companion.

card.name: Sauron
card.property: Damage +2. Enduring. Fierce. For each burden you spot, threat you spot, and site you control, Sauron's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Gorgoroth Swarm
card.property: Besieger. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may spot 6 companions to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

card.name: Ghan-buri-Ghan
card.property: While you can spot 2 other Men, Ghan-buri-Ghan cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. While at a forest site, Ghan-buri-Ghan is defender +1.

card.name: Radagast
card.property: Bearer must be Radagast. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Anarion
card.property: Skirmish: Play a [Gondor] skirmish event to make each minion skirmishing Anarion strength -X, where X is Anarion's vitality.

card.name: Erkenbrand
card.property: If you can spot a [Rohan] Man, you may play Erkenbrand any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Erkenbrand, you may discard a Shadow possession.

card.name: Tom Bombadil
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Shire] companions. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden or a threat, add a [Shire] token here. Fellowship: Remove 2 [Shire] tokens from here to remove a burden.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2.

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Knight. Ranger. Ring-bound.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Damage +1. Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Frodo
card.property: Ring-bearer (Resistance 10). The twilight cost of each artifact, possession, and [Shire] tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.name: The One Ring
card.property: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: Nocked
card.property: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.name: Boromir
card.property: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a [Gondor] companion.

card.name: Bow of Minas Tirith
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Armored Easterling
card.property: Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a lurker damage +1.

card.name: Poleaxe
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Skirmish: Remove (2) to make a [Men] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Champion Orc
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Orc] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.name: Spurred to Battle
card.property: To play, exert an [Orc] minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add (1).

card.name: Riders of the Mark
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Rohan] companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

card.name: Sam
card.property: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Eomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Eomer to play a [Rohan] companion from your draw deck.

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Toldea, you may exert him to take a [Ringwraith] event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.name: Sting
card.property: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Olog-Hai Bestial
card.property: Degats +1. Acharne. Pour jouer, designez un seide [Orc]. Affectation : Affaiblissez ce seide pour l'affecter a un compagnon qui detient un artefact. Le joueur des Peuples Libres peut defausser un artefact en jeu pour prevenir ceci.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Each time Eowyn wins a skirmish, each other [Rohan] Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Jarnsmid
card.property: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another [Gandalf] companion).

card.name: Vapour and Steam
card.property: Skirmish: Exert your [Gandalf] companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

card.name: Massing Strength
card.property: Discard any number of your [Orc] minions from play to make an [Orc] minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

card.name: Morgul Tormentor
card.property: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.name: Farmer Maggot
card.property: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

card.name: Mithril-coat
card.property: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an [Uruk-hai] minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

card.name: Keening Wail
card.property: Toil 2. (For each [Ringwraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgul to add a burden.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: When you play Ulaire Lemenya, you may play a [Ringwraith] mount from your discard pile.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.name: The Mouth of Sauron
card.property: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a [Men] condition or [Men] possession from your draw deck.

card.name: Orophin
card.property: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

card.name: Grima
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another [Men] minion to exert each companion.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Shadow: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [Ringwraith] condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [Ringwraith] card revealed this way into hand.

card.name: Hama
card.property: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

card.name: Guard of the White Tree
card.property: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a [Gondor] condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each [Ringwraith] character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Attea is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Ulaire Attea to add a burden.

card.name: Ulaire Nelya
card.property: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Ulaire Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Ulaire Cantea
card.property: While Ulaire Cantea is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

card.name: Ulaire Lemenya
card.property: Each character skirmishing Ulaire Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

card.name: Ulaire Enquea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Enquea, if you can spot 2 other Nazgul, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each [Ringwraith] card revealed this way into hand.

card.name: Ulaire Toldea
card.property: Fierce. Each time Ulaire Toldea wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: Ulaire Nertea
card.property: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Ulaire Nertea is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgul is strength +2.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a [Gondor] possession, he is defender +1.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: Each possession you play on Eowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a [Rohan] token (or reinforce 2 [Rohan] tokens if you can spot Eomer or Theoden).

card.name: Isildur
card.property: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

card.name: Isengard Marauder
card.property: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other [Orc] minions, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Covetous Uruk
card.property: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.name: Haldir
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.name: Lurtz
card.property: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People's player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Valiant. While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion gains hunter 1.

card.name: Primitive Brand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another [Men] minion. If you do, stack a [Men] minion from play on a [Men] possession in your support area.

card.name: Watcher at Sarn Ford
card.property: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 2. When you play Faramir, Shadow players cannot play minions until the end of the turn. The move limit is +2.

card.name: Buckland Homestead
card.property: Dwelling. Shadow: Play a Nazgul to discard a condition from play.

card.name: Caras Galadhon
card.property: Forest. No more than 1 minion can be assigned to each skirmish.

card.name: Cavern Entrance
card.property: Underground. Skirmish special abilities cannot be used.

card.name: Neekerbreekers
card.property: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to here, heal each character who has resistance 5 or more and exert each other character.

card.name: Theodred
card.property: While you can spot a [Rohan] Man who has resistance of 7 or more, Theodred is twilight cost -1. At the start of each skirmish involving Theodred, you may exert each minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Elendil
card.property: Knight. To play, spot 2 [Gondor] knights or exert 2 [Gondor] men. Each of your [Gondor] companions is resistance +1. Maneuver: Remove a [Gondor] token to make an unbound companion resistance +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Ordnance Grunt
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an [Orc] minion. Shadow: Discard an [Orc] condition from play to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Bilbo
card.property: Ring-bound. While Bilbo is not assigned to a skirmish, each Ring-bound Hobbit is strength +1. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may remove a burden for each other Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: Cave Troll of Moria
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a [Moria] Orc. Menace - When you play this minion you may draw 3 cards.

card.name: Breeding Pit of Isengard
card.property: Underground. The twilight cost of the first hunter minion played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.name: City of Kings
card.property: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may draw a card.

card.name: Pinnacle of Zirakzigil
card.property: Mountain. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may exert 3 companions to play a Wizard from your dead pile.

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.property: Dwelling. At the start of your fellowship phase, you may add a burden to play a ranger from your draw deck.

card.name: Falls of Rauros
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site in region 2, the Free Peoples player places a card from the dead pile out of play.

card.name: Imladris
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, if it is a sanctuary, remove 2 burdens.

card.name: Arwen
card.property: Ranger. Archer. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2. While you can spot an Elf, Arwen is twilight cost -1. While skirmishing a Nazgul, Arwen is strength +3. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to draw a card.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: Damage +3. Defender +3. Skirmish: Exert Gandalf to make a companion strength +1.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Damage +3. Fierce. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign him to an unbound companion. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make him strength +1.

card.name: Moria Skirmishers
card.property: Archer. Each time Moria Skirmishers wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion. While skirmishing an Elf or a Dwarf, Moria Skirmishers is strength +2. Shadow: Discard this minion to play a [Moria] minion. That minion's twilight cost is -10.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. Damage +3. Fellowship: Exert Eomer to play a mount on him from your draw deck. Eomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing. At the start of your turn, you may heal a [Rohan] ally. While you can spot a [Rohan] man, Eomer is twilight cost -1.

card.name: Morgul Patrol
card.property: Besieger. Tracker. The site number of each [Sauron] Orc is -3. Response: If Morgul Patrol wins a skirmish, exert it to make it fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Exert Morgul Patrol to wound a character it is skirmishing. Regroup: Exert Morgul Patrol to make the Free Peoples player exert X companions, where X is the number of burdens you can spot.
